pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chipmunk is a fast, simple, portable, 2D physics engine (<http://code.google.com/p/chipmunk-physics/>). This package the Chipmunk 5.3.4 source and Haskell bindings to all of its functions. It is completely self-contained. Please see <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/HipmunkPlayground> for a demonstration of this library.
